query:
-- Criar uma compra (purchase) simulando pagamento aprovado
INSERT INTO purchases (
  id,
  email,
  whatsapp,
  plan_id,
  amount,
  currency,
  status,
  payment_method,
  mercadopago_preference_id,
  mercadopago_payment_id,
  created_at,
  updated_at
) VALUES (
  'test-purchase-' || FLOOR(RAND() * 1000000),
  'teste@peladapro.com.br',
  '11999887766',
  'popular',
  69.90,
  'BRL',
  'approved',
  'pix',
  'TEST-PREF-12345',
  'TEST-PAY-67890',
  NOW(),
  NOW()
);

-- Criar o campeonato associado à compra
INSERT INTO campaigns (
  id,
  name,
  slug,
  owner_email,
  owner_whatsapp,
  plan_id,
  plan_months,
  purchase_id,
  expires_at,
  is_active,
  created_at,
  updated_at
) VALUES (
  'test-campaign-' || FLOOR(RAND() * 1000000),
  'Campeonato Teste Mercado Pago',
  'teste-mercadopago-2026',
  'teste@peladapro.com.br',
  '11999887766',
  'popular',
  3,
  (SELECT id FROM purchases WHERE email = 'teste@peladapro.com.br' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1),
  DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 3 MONTH),
  1,
  NOW(),
  NOW()
);

-- Verificar se foi criado
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE slug = 'teste-mercadopago-2026';
